name: Medical Professional
description: Traditional, conservative design suitable for doctors and medical specialists. Navy blue accents with certification and education prominence.

sections.title: Professional Summary
sections.content: Board-certified cardiologist with 12+ years clinical experience in interventional cardiology and cardiac catheterisation. AHPRA registered specialist with extensive experience in complex coronary interventions and structural heart disease management across major Australian teaching hospitals.

jobs.title: Consultant Cardiologist
bullets: Perform 300+ cardiac catheterisations annually with 98% procedural success rate
Lead multidisciplinary heart team managing complex structural heart disease cases
Supervise cardiology registrars and fellows in interventional procedures
Chair hospital cardiac catheterisation laboratory quality improvement committee

jobs.title: Senior Registrar in Cardiology
bullets: Completed advanced training in interventional cardiology and cardiac imaging
Managed acute coronary syndrome patients in coronary care unit
Participated in 24/7 primary PCI roster with door-to-balloon times <90 minutes
Conducted clinical research in coronary artery disease outcomes

sections.title: Certifications & Licences
certifications: Fellowship of Royal Australasian College of Physicians (FRACP)

sections.title: Research & Publications
publications: Primary PCI Outcomes in Regional Australia - Journal of Interventional Cardiology (2023)
Drug-Eluting Stent Performance in Diabetic Patients - Heart, Lung and Circulation (2022)
Co-author: 15+ peer-reviewed publications in interventional cardiology

sections.title: Professional Memberships
memberships: Cardiac Society of Australia and New Zealand (CSANZ)
Australian and New Zealand Society of Cardiac and Thoracic Surgeons
